description: This file defines the TaskRepository class, which manages task data operations such as adding, updating, deleting, and toggling completion status, interfacing with the TaskDao data access object.

classes.name: TaskRepository
classes.description: A repository class providing data operations for Task objects, acting as an intermediary between data sources and the rest of the application.

methods.name: observeAll
methods.description: Returns a Flow that emits lists of all Tasks being observed.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new task with the provided title if it is not blank.

methods.name: updateTitle
methods.description: Updates the title of an existing task identified by its id, setting the current timestamp.

methods.name: toggleCompleted
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of the specified task.
